translations.Breeze Dark theme for Nextcloud, based o: Breeze Dark theme for Nextcloud, based on the theme by KDE
translations.A Dark theme based on Breeze Dark by the: A dark theme based on Breeze Dark by the KDE project. Please refresh the page for changes to take effect.
translations.This setting will enforce the usage of t: This setting will enforce the usage of this theme. Please note, this will prevent users from disabling or choosing a different theme.
translations.Enforce use of the Breeze Dark theme: Enforce use of the Breeze Dark theme
translations.This setting will enable the automated a: This setting will enable the automated activation by the clients system settings by default, for any unauthenticated users and users who have not set a preference.
translations.Enable Breeze Dark automated activation: Enable Breeze Dark automated activation by the clients system settings by default
translations.This setting will allow you to choose if: This setting will allow you to choose if the login page is themed or not. This will only take effect if the theme is enforced or for a user who has the theme enabled during login.
A Breeze Dark theme for Nextcloud.
translations.Enable Breeze Dark automated activation: Enable Breeze Dark automated activation by clients system settings
